issue.title: [CF 1045] WoD - TMW failed to initialize
issue.body:
Running TMW version 7.2.1.  It has not worked for me since the WoD expansion released.  I have redownloaded this version several times.  Below is the LUA error upon login.  Any help/advice would be appreciated.  Thank you.

Message: Interface\AddOns\TellMeWhen\TellMeWhen.lua:1772: attempt to index field 'IconDataProcessor' (a nil value)
Time: 12/05/14 11:27:26
Count: 1
Stack: Interface\AddOns\TellMeWhen\TellMeWhen.lua:1772: in function `?'
...ore\Libs\CallbackHandler-1.0\CallbackHandler-1.0.lua:147: in function <...ore\Libs\CallbackHandler-1.0\CallbackHandler-1.0.lua:147>
[string "safecall Dispatcher[1]"]:4: in function <[string "safecall Dispatcher[1]"]:4>
[C]: ?
[string "safecall Dispatcher[1]"]:13: in function `?'
...ore\Libs\CallbackHandler-1.0\CallbackHandler-1.0.lua:92: in function `Fire'
...ace\AddOns\Postal\Libs\AceEvent-3.0\AceEvent-3.0.lua:120: in function <...ace\AddOns\Postal\Libs\AceEvent-3.0\AceEvent-3.0.lua:119>

Locals: <none>


> Posted by CurseForge user Ano12 | Imported from CurseForge issue #1045 | Raw

comments.body:
Assuming this is the same issue that I've seen before (I'm not 100% sure that it is), then I still have no idea what causes it. Some files of TMW are just not being loaded by WoW for some unknown reason.

Some users have reported that installing via the Curse Client has fixed the issue for them in the past. Try that, and let me know if it fixes the issue.


> Posted by CurseForge user Cybeloras

How strange, that fixed it. Thanks a lot Cybeloras.


> Posted by CurseForge user Ano12
